cards.title: AI Agents That Execute Business Workflows (Claude Code for ERP)
tldr: **AI agents automate business workflows, enhancing efficiency in ERP systems.**
The system executes tasks like procurement and invoicing autonomously.
Designed for small service businesses to streamline operations.

cards.title: What Is OpenClaw and How to Build AI-Powered Automation Workflows
tldr: **OpenClaw enables AI-powered automation workflows for various applications.**
Users can build custom workflows using a user-friendly interface.
Ideal for enhancing efficiency in project management tasks.

cards.title: Microsoft brings project-focused AI agents into OneDrive
tldr: **Microsoft introduces AI agents in OneDrive to enhance project management capabilities.**
These AI agents assist users in organizing and managing project-related files effectively.
Ideal for teams looking to streamline project workflows and improve collaboration.

cards.title: Wrike agents: No-code AI for supercharged productivity
tldr: **No-code AI agents designed to enhance productivity for PMO teams.**
Integrates seamlessly with existing workflows to streamline project management tasks.
Ideal for automating routine processes and improving project delivery efficiency.

cards.title: NAVER D2SF Invests in AI Workflow Automation Platform 'CNAPS.AI'
tldr: **CNAPS.AI enhances workflow automation using AI technology.**
The platform streamlines processes for various industries.
It can benefit PMO teams by improving project efficiency and communication.

cards.title: SMM AI Readiness: A Prescriptive AI Checklist
tldr: **AI readiness checklist enhances strategic planning for manufacturers.**
Focuses on assessing AI capabilities and integration within smart manufacturing.
Useful for organizations aiming to leverage AI for operational efficiency.

cards.title: Positron AI raises $230M at over $1B valuation to build energy-efficient AI accelerator hardware
tldr: **Positron AI secures $230M funding to enhance AI accelerator hardware efficiency.**
The funding values the company at over $1 billion, indicating strong investor confidence.
This development aims to address energy consumption challenges in AI technology.

cards.title: Intel sets sights on data center GPUs amid AI-driven infrastructure shifts
tldr: Intel aims to enhance its data center GPUs in response to AI infrastructure demands.
The focus is on improving performance for AI workloads and data processing.
This move is part of a broader trend in the tech industry towards AI-driven solutions.

cards.title: RAF-led Project BOYD to explore AI-driven planning
tldr: **AI-driven planning aims to enhance military decision-making efficiency.**
Project BOYD will utilize AI to streamline command and control processes.
The initiative focuses on improving commanders' information processing and operational decisions.

cards.title: Anthropic debuts Claude Cowork plugins to help users automate more tasks
tldr: Automation tool applicable to PMO workflows for enhancing task efficiency and reducing manual effort.
Users can create custom plugins to tailor Claude Cowork for specific project management tasks.
Ideal for teams needing to automate document handling and data visualization in project execution.

cards.title: Domo's App Catalyst: Bridging AI Prompts to Enterprise Apps
tldr: App Catalyst tool applicable to PMO project delivery by transforming natural language into production-ready apps.
Integrate with platforms like Snowflake and Databricks to enhance data governance and compliance in app development.
Ideal for technical users in PMOs seeking rapid prototyping and stakeholder demonstrations of AI-driven applications.

cards.title: How Atlassian cut PR cycle time by 45% with AI code reviews
tldr: AI code review tool that **cut PR cycle time by 45%**, enhancing team efficiency.
Rovo Dev provides instant feedback and enforces coding standards, useful for PMO quality assurance.
Ideal for software development teams looking to streamline code review processes and reduce bottlenecks.

tldr: AI agents like Claude Cowork can benefit PMO teams by streamlining task delegation and enhancing productivity.
